name: Scorekeeper Pro - Keep Score for Dice, Card, Board and Sports Games!
name_original: Scorekeeper Pro - Keep Score for Dice, Card, Board and Sports Games!
description:
Can’t find a pencil or paper to keep score? Use Scorekeeper Pro to score your game! With customizable player names, a large “scoreboard” font, and finger friendly buttons, Scorekeeper lets you easily keep the score for any two or four-player game. Card games like Rummy. Board games like Scrabble. Sports games like basketball or soccer. Scorekeeper also remembers the score in between uses, so you can take a phone call or look up that “legal” word your opponent wants to use.

Features:
-Fully compatible with iOS 6+.
-Work in any device orientation, even upside down!
-Keeps score up to 999 for 2 or 4 teams.
-Customizable buttons! Swipe up to reveal the settings screen.
-Tap on the name at the top to customize the team name.
-Team names and scores are saved automatically in between uses.
